summary: I was messing around in BodySlide and I thought I would share what I have made.
descriptionHtml:
Stupidly Large Tits is a BodySlide++ Preset. I was messing around in BodySlide and I thought I would share what I made.
The tits are quite big, it's pretty funny if you have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url] installed.

[font=Verdana][size=3]How to Install:
[/size][/font]NMM - Just click download with Manager
Manual - Copy the 'Data' folder to Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim

[font=Verdana][size=3]Recommend Mods:
[/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url] (Needed)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url] (Funny)

[font=Verdana][size=3]Other things:
[/size][/font]Armour I used - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52130/?]Daedric Chainmail
[/url]Hair - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
Tail and Ears - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58165/?]HDT Tails Wearable[/url]
Follower in first pic - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17354/?]Sexy Warrior Companion Ria[/url]
Follower in third pic -  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37869/?]Chaconne Follower[/url]
How to have multiple followers - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
Armour in third pic - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29411/?]TERA Armor Collection - CBBE - standalone[/url]
Armour add on in third pic - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59267/?]HDT and Bodyslide conversion for Frigus' Tera Armor Collection CBBE[/url]
author: Pokemon3DS
